subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kurt Busch, 35, hopes to become the fourth driver, but the first in 10 years, to try the doubleheader: the Indy 500 in the day on May 25 and the Coca-Cola 600 in North Carolina at night.
snippet: Kurt Busch, 35, hopes to become the fourth driver, but the first in 10 years, to try the doubleheader: the Indy 500 in the day on May 25 and the Coca-Cola 600 in North Carolina at night.
